name: COUNT with multi boundary
inputs:
SELECT ?parent WHERE
	{ 
		?parent a :Person.
		?parent :hasChild ?child .
		?child :age ?age .
		FILTER(?age >= 18)
	}
	GROUP BY ?parent
	HAVING (COUNT(?child) >= 2) (COUNT(?child) < 5)
mapping:
RULE 
		CONDITION CLASS :Person  
			:hasChild TYPE 
				( CLASS ANY AGGREGATION COUNT >=2, <5  
					:age VALUE >=18 )
		PRODUCTION CLASS :PersonWithTwoAdultChildren
